title: Braum and Poppy Chroma Packs
body: When did they say they were adding in the new Chroma packs (the Poppy and Braum ones)? I remembered them saying that they would implement them into the store during 6.22 which is this patch but I haven't heard anything else about them. It even has the option to select them in the client but they still can't be bought. Anyone have any ideas or know anything?

replies.body: next patch is tomorrow. so very very soon.
today is the tomorrow you said, but there is nothing still. why?
welp Riot are just dead set liars then. It is now patch 6.23 and no Braum or Poppy Chromas. Shame on you Riot.
I aint getting those braum chromas. I'm saving for daddy santa :^) kappa pride
